Name: Qix
AboutMe:
I am no longer contributing to Stack Overflow or the Stack Exchange network.

I spent about a quarter of my entire life on this site, contributing to what I thought was a great community and under the advisement of superb moderators. This is not the case anymore, and unfortunately it has been expressed rather clearly as of late that the community is unable to sustain its friendly attitude.

Development, collaboration and learning has turned into a chore here. I refuse to participate in such a toxic environment.

Goodbye.

"Every programmer is developing in [a] group of programmers. The smallest group is yourself, and [your future self]." - Michael Suodenjoki

"I'm pragmatic, not dogmatic." - Jon Skeet
